feed.title: Combined summary - [PULL] Wallet Private Key Encryption Take 3

entry.title: Combined summary - [PULL] Wallet Private Key Encryption Take 3
entry.summary: Matt Corallo, a Bitcoin developer, has rebased onto the wallet class and is ready for "wtf is this crap" messages for Wallet Encryption. He posted the update on Github and asked for final comments/ACKs. The post was met with good discussion and a bit of results, indicating that the feature is now in a pull-able state.
